title: Kinda Funny: The Animated Series - Ep. 3 "Classic Colin"
description:
Watch Kinda Funny: The Animated Series Episodes 1 and 2!

Ep. 1 "Politically Correct Dodgeball": https://youtu.be/2yhISvYtugM

Ep. 2 "Haters Gonna Hate": https://youtu.be/x-ukJa3fG2Y



Support us at http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny
 
Subscribe to Kinda Funny! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy
 
 
Written by Nick Scarpino
Animation by Dagan Moriarty
Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
 
Travis Willingham as Old Man Dunkelman http://www.twitter.com/Willingblam
Matt Scarpino as Matt Scarpino http://www.twitter.com/ScarpinoMan
Additional voices: Chris Tornow
 

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Kevin - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyKevin

transcript_chunks.text: I can't believe we're doing this again I know right the new Power Rangers movie is debuting on Netflix right now I could be live tweeting stop complaining it's not like I'm asking you to wash Grandma Miller's soiled undergarments by hand because she doesn't want them to get frayed by the newfangled washing machine old people are weird is not that I mind being here for a friend it's just when he gets in these moods I sort of feel like we're enabling him look Colin is my best friend in the whole wide world Nick you're next then Tim Kevin is a very distant fourth a man this is a hard day for Colin it's the only 4-hour period in the entire year when not one single sporting event is taking place the last time this happened I found him in the basement simming games of NHL 94 and his SNES he was going number one into empty mayonnaise jars and humming the theme song to Degrassi High damn that's low I love Degrassi what do you want hi Colin it's me Greg your best friend I didn't

SNES he was going number one into empty mayonnaise jars and humming the theme song to Degrassi High damn that's low I love Degrassi what do you want hi Colin it's me Greg your best friend I didn't order any pancakes go away the hell is he talking about pancakes he's hallucinating he thinks I'm the pancake delivery man that's a real thing come on just one goal for your boy Colin sweet Jeff Johns in the sky it's worse than I thought no icing no icing oh he's clearly offside you missed that pass at the point we'll get through this this game and the Russians won't stand a chance Tavares Tavares will show us the way oh we've got to do something to break the trance why don't we just go down there and turn it off I wish it was that simple his mind and the 1990s computing power of the SNES have become one killing one could cause irreparable damage to the other I have an idea Greg let me see your microphone do you carry that mic around with you at all times duh does Whiz Khalifa carry

have become one killing one could cause irreparable damage to the other I have an idea Greg let me see your microphone do you carry that mic around with you at all times duh does Whiz Khalifa carry a mic around with him at all times no really yeah why would Whiz Khalifa carry around a mic he has a whole team of people to do that for him guys it's ready huh who's that Mom no Colin it's me the SNES I can't believe it yes Colin it's really me me Almighty as woo no I mean I can't believe out of all the times I've talked to you in the past you choose now to talk back um we're in the middle of the **** playoffs were crying out loud why don't you just cut my wrist while you're at it I really don't know how to respond to that all those years I spent begging you for help you could have saved me literally a thousand hours in ActRaiser if you had just spoken up to me then you wait until Tavares is on a hot streak to reach out to me unacceptable to be fair NHL 94 was made in 1993

have saved me literally a thousand hours in ActRaiser if you had just spoken up to me then you wait until Tavares is on a hot streak to reach out to me unacceptable to be fair NHL 94 was made in 1993 Tavares is even in the game John Tavares is always in the game and you better watch your goddamn tone before I knock your cartridge through your ass tough talk from a man whose team hasn't even won a cup in three decades yo you talking **** about the Islanders now I'm talking truth son well how are you going to talk with my fist through your goddamn mouth I got to go poop well at least we got him out of the basement so can we get pancakes now
